trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Deerfield Beach
There were no other sightings in Deerfield Beach on or around October 22nd 2010
divs: Sighting Details What I saw along with two bystanders for confirmation. Were two Huge Triangles drifting along the Atlantic coast. They were the size of a football field with a "orb" following them they hovered over the beach area at a very high altitude! They were transparent, they stopped for 30 minutes drifted slowly It was quite a spectacle, I'll never forget it!
